import Mathlib

/-- Let x, y ∈ ℝ. State the reverse triangle inequality: | |x| - |y| | ≤ |x - y|. -/
theorem abs_abs_sub_abs_le_abs_sub (x y : ℝ) : abs (abs x - abs y) ≤ abs (x - y) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Let x, y ∈ ℝ. State the reverse triangle inequality: | |x| - |y| | ≤ |x - y|. -/
